trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There was one other sighting in Fort Worth on or around November 2nd 2003
divs: Sighting Detailsfacing south around mid night, looking up at the stars while the dogs went outfor the evening. Saw a star move slowly thought nothing. Then it moved very,VERy fast south east, then stoped, stayed like that for about 30 secounds. Icalled my friend inside the house and asked her to look at it wanted to makesure I wasnt mistaken. we looked up and it moved so slow for 5 or 10 sec. thenit speed across further eastward and vanished.
